data.oai_dc:dc: Morphological, fitness, fluctuating asymmetry measures for Male-limited and Control flies. See published article for details. Data presented are mean values for each combination of selection treatment, sex, and replicate population, collected from the laboratory.
Experimental evolution|Insects|Morphometrics|Sexual selection & conflicts|Intralocus sexual conflict|Ontogenetic sexual conflict|Geometric morphometrics|Sexual size dimorphism
